abstracts.cdata!:
The Financial and Enterprise Sector
            Adjustment Credit will provide balance of payments support
            to the Government to help it pursue its stabilization and
            structural reform program in the face of a difficult
            external environment. This operation will support
            implementation of major reforms in the enterprise and
            banking sector, accompanied by a social safety net program,
            and help restore the country's creditworthiness by
            assisting in the arrears clearing process of the
            country's debt to preferred creditors started under the
            Economic Recovery Loan and Credit (ERL).
